title: MetaDeck
settingsEnabledDesc: Whether this module or provider should be used
settingsOverridesDesc: Overrides what game the provider detects a given app as
metadataSettingsTypeOverrideDesc: Overrides the app type in steam's info page to always show the metadata
metadataSettingsDescriptionsDesc: Pulls descriptions from providers and injects it into steam's info page
metadataSettingsReleaseDateDesc: Pulls release date from providers and injects it into steam's info page
metadataSettingsAssociationsDesc: Pulls developers and publishers from providers and injects it into steam's info page
metadataSettingsCategoriesDesc: Pulls categories from providers and injects it into steam's store categories
metadataSettingsRatingDesc: Pulls ratings data from providers and injects it into steam's metacritic data
metadataSettingsInstallSizeDesc: Measures file size and injects it into steam's install size data
metadataSettingsInstallDateDesc: Measures file date and injects it into steam's install date data
metadataSettingsMarkdownDesc: Injects a markdown renderer in every game's description
metadataSettingsTitleHeaderDesc: Injects a title header into every game's description
compatdataSettingsVerifiedDesc: Pulls compat data from providers and injects it into steam's deck verified indicators
compatdataSettingsNotesDesc: Pulls additional compatibility information from providers and injects it into steam's deck verified indicators
